li.text: Probably easiest ways add a method to a category is to use the

para.text: If you choose to enter a new category name, be aware that categories can exist in hierarchies. This should become apparent when looking at the tree of existing categories in the category prompter. When you create a new category, if you wish to enter a hierarchical category name then use '-' as the hierarchy separator.
If you wish to remove a method from a particular category then the
menu will allow you to do this.

li.text: If you know what category the method is to belong to, and that category is already displayed in the
pane of the browser, then you can simply drag the method and drop it onto the category required.

para.text: Note that, by default, the drag operation will add the method to the chosen category. If you use a Shift+drag operation then the method will be moved to be in the chosen category alone and will be removed from any others. Using Alt+drag will remove the method from the dropped over category.
